name: peddler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
especially in the past, a person who travelled to different places to sell small goods, usually by going from house to house
disapproving someone who gives ideas to other people: a peddler of New Age philosophies (drug) peddler old-fashioned
someone who sells illegal drugs to people: I wish the police would arrest all the drug peddlers that hang around in our local park.
